description.value:
The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its web garotte.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 1d8 type=poison average=true]] damage. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 11 format=long]] or be &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which the ettercap has advantage on the attack roll. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target canâ€™t breathe, and the ettercap has advantage on attack rolls against it.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by webbing. As an action, the &Reference[restrained]{restrained} creature can make a DC 11 &Reference[str]{Strength} check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect also ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, vulnerability to &Reference[fire]{fire} damage, and immunity to &Reference[bludgeoning]{bludgeoning}, &Reference[poison]{poison}, and &Reference[psychic]{psychic} damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Spider Climb. The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Web Sense. While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Web Walker. The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
